description: Brandwatch Influence is an end-to-end influencer marketing solution that enables searching for influencers, managing relationships via CRM, handling payments, and organizing campaign tracking all in one platform.

user_flows.description: Complete workflow for creating and configuring a new Influence account with security authentication
prerequisites: Invitation email received from Brandwatch administrator
Valid mobile phone number for verification
Authenticator app installed (Google Authenticator or Authy recommended)
Access to email for invitation acceptance

steps.description: Access the Influence platform through invitation email
details: Check email for Brandwatch Influence invitation

steps.description: Set up name and secure password
details: Enter full name in Name field

steps.description: Add and verify primary mobile number for account security
details: Enter mobile phone number with country code
Enter verification code in confirmation field
If code not received, click 'Try sending it again here'
If still no code after 5 minutes, select 'Confirm that the phone number is correct'

steps.description: Set up 2FA for enhanced account security
details: Choose authentication method: Authenticator app (recommended) or text message
- Download Google Authenticator or Authy app
- Scan QR code displayed on screen
- Receive SMS code on verified phone number

steps.description: Finalize account creation and access Influence tools
details: Access to Discover, CRM, Campaigns, and Payments tools
Account ready for influencer marketing activities

two_factor_authentication.note: SMS codes not supported in some countries

security_requirements.phone_verification: Required for account recovery and security

options: Authenticator app: More secure, works globally, requires smartphone app
Text message: Simple setup, dependent on SMS service availability
Recommendation: Use authenticator app for better security and reliability
Generate strong password meeting all requirements
Use password manager for secure storage
Ensure password is unique to Influence platform

outcomes: Fully configured Influence account with secure authentication
Access to complete influencer marketing platform
Two-factor authentication enabled for enhanced security
Verified contact information for account recovery
Ready to begin influencer discovery and campaign management

core_tools.purpose: Search and identify influencers suitable for brand partnerships
Manage relationships and communications with influencers
Organize, track, and measure influencer marketing campaigns
Handle financial transactions and compensation for influencers

platform_benefits: Integrated workflow from discovery to payment
Secure payment processing for influencer compensation
limitations: Limited documentation available for detailed workflow analysis
Advanced features and processes not covered in available materials
Specific tool functionalities require additional documentation
key_features: Built-in CRM for influencer relationship management
Integrated payment system for influencer compensation
Secure account setup with two-factor authentication
Mobile phone verification for account security
